name: Comedy Ladies And Their Characters Online Trivia | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following actresses has portrayed Sheila Kingston, Lucille Toody, and Doris Murphy?
questions.explanation:
Rosie O'Donnell.

	The role of Sheila Kingston was in the 1994 comedy bomb "Exit to Eden".  Lucille Toody was Rosie's character in the 1994 comedy "Car 54, Where Are You".  Who could forget Rosie's role as the smart mouthed third base person, Doris Murphy, in the 1992 heartfelt comedy "A League of Their Own".

questions.text: Which of the following actresses has portrayed Cynthia Topping, Martha Alston, and Janet Hall?
questions.explanation:
Ellen DeGeneres.

	Cynthia Topping was Ellen's character in the 1999 comedy "EDTV".  Ellen played Martha Alston in the 1996 comedy "Mr. Wrong".  Janet Hall was the role that Ellen played in the unseen comedy from 1999 "The Love Letter".

questions.text: Which of the following ladies portrayed Peggy Flemming, Gail Fletcher Dwyer, and Emily Montgomery?
questions.explanation:
Joan Cusack.

	Joan portrayed Peggy Flemming in the Julia Roberts' 1999 comedy "Runaway Bride".  She played Gail Fletcher Dwyer in the 1995 comedy "Nine Months".  She starred opposite Kevin Kline as Emily Montgomery in the 1997 comedy "In & Out".

questions.text: Which of the following actresses has played the characters Nancy Kendricks, Julia Sullivan, and Bjergen Kjergen?
questions.explanation:
Drew Barrymore.

	Drew portrayed Nancy Kendricks in the little seen 2003 Danny DeVito comedy "Duplex".  She played Julia Sullivan opposite Adam Sandler in the 1998 film "The Wedding Singer".  Bjergen Kjergen was a small role that she had in the Mike Myers and Dana Carvey comedy from 1993 "Wayne's World 2".

questions.text: Which of the following ladies portrayed Sandy Brozinsky, Brenda Cushman, and Barbara Stone?
questions.explanation:
Bette Midler.

	The fabulous Miss Bette played Sandy Brozinsky opposite Shelley Long in the 1987 comedy "Outrageous Fortune".  Brenda Cushman was Bette's character in the 1996 comedy "The First Wives Club".  Bette starred opposite Danny DeVito in the 1986 comedy "Ruthless People".

questions.text: Which of the following women portrayed Kate McKay, Kathleen Kelly, and Sally Albright?
questions.explanation:
Meg Ryan.

	Kate McKay was Meg's character in the 2001 comedy "Kate and Leopold".  She portrayed Kathleen Kelly in the 1998 Tom Hanks comedy "You've Got Mail".  Finally Miss Ryan played the unforgettable character of Sally Albright in the 1989 comedy "When Harry Met Sally".

questions.text: Which of the following comediennes has portrayed the characters Ruth Patchett, Nancy Seavers, and Julie Ubriacco?
questions.explanation:
Roseanne.

	Roseanne played Ruth Patchett in the 1989 comedy "She-Devil".  She played Nancy Seavers in the made for television movie "Backfield in Motion".  Roseanne then played the voice of Julie Ubriacco in the 1990 film "Look Who's Talking Too".

questions.text: Which of the following ladies has portrayed Gladys Leeman, Diane Barrows, and Marjorie Turner?
questions.explanation:
Kirstie Alley.

	Gladys Leeman was Kirstie's character in the 1999 beauty pagent comedy "Drop Dead Gorgeous".  She played Diane Barrows opposite the Olsen twins in the 1995 film "It Takes Two".  Probably one of my favorite roles for Kirstie Alley was when she played the uptight housewife Marjorie Turner in the 1990 comedy "Sibling Rivalry".

questions.text: Which of the following ladies has portrayed Rachel Flax, Loretta Castorini, and Alexandra Medford?
questions.explanation:
Cher.

	Cher portrayed Rachel Flax in the 1990 comedy "Mermaids".  She  played Loretta Castorini in her Oscar winning performance in the 1987 comedy "Moonstruck".  She played Alexandra Medford in the 1987 comedy opposite Jack Nicholson in "The Witches of Eastwick".

questions.text: Which of the following big box office draws has played Kathleen Harrison, Samantha Barzel, and Grace Bichon?
questions.explanation:
Julia Roberts.

	Julia played Kathleen "KiKi" Harrison in the 2001 comedy "America's Sweethearts".  She played Samantha Barzel opposite Brad Pitt in the 2001 action comedy "The Mexican".  She played Grace Bichon opposite Dennis Quaid in the 1995 comedy "Something to Talk About".
